coffees.name: Latte
coffees.description: A classic coffee drink made with espresso and steamed milk, topped with a small amount of foam.

coffees.name: Cappuccino
coffees.description: An Italian coffee drink that is traditionally composed of espresso, steamed milk, and foam.

coffees.name: Mocha
coffees.description: A chocolate-flavored variant of a latte, often with whipped cream and chocolate shavings.

coffees.name: Americano
coffees.description: A diluted espresso with hot water, resembling a drip coffee but with a different flavor profile.

coffees.name: Espresso
coffees.description: A concentrated coffee beverage brewed by forcing hot water under pressure through finely-ground coffee.

coffees.name: Cold Brew
coffees.description: Coffee brewed with cold water over an extended period, resulting in a smoother and less acidic taste.

coffees.name: Iced Latte
coffees.description: Similar to a regular latte but served over ice for a refreshing experience.

coffees.name: Caramel Macchiato
coffees.description: An espresso-based drink with steamed milk and vanilla syrup, topped with caramel drizzle.

coffees.name: Hazelnut Flavored Coffee
coffees.description: Coffee flavored with the rich and nutty taste of hazelnut.

coffees.name: Vanilla Latte
coffees.description: A latte with the sweet and comforting flavor of vanilla.

coffees.name: Flat White
coffees.description: Similar to a latte but with a higher coffee-to-milk ratio, creating a velvety and strong flavor.

coffees.name: Affogato
coffees.description: A dessert coffee made by pouring a shot of hot espresso over a scoop of vanilla ice cream.

coffees.name: Irish Coffee
coffees.description: Coffee with a kick, made with hot coffee, Irish whiskey, and topped with cream.

coffees.name: Turkish Coffee
coffees.description: A traditional method of brewing coffee in finely ground coffee beans and water, often with sugar.

coffees.name: Ristretto
coffees.description: A short shot of espresso with a strong and concentrated flavor.

coffees.name: Maple Pecan Latte
coffees.description: A latte flavored with the sweetness of maple syrup and the nuttiness of pecans.

coffees.name: Coconut Milk Mocha
coffees.description: A mocha made with coconut milk for a dairy-free and tropical twist.

coffees.name: Chai Latte
coffees.description: A spiced tea concentrate mixed with steamed milk for a warm and aromatic beverage.

coffees.name: White Chocolate Raspberry Mocha
coffees.description: A mocha with the sweet combination of white chocolate and raspberry flavors.

coffees.name: Pumpkin Spice Latte
coffees.description: A fall favorite, featuring pumpkin spice flavors in a latte with whipped cream on top.

coffees.name: Vietnamese Iced Coffee
coffees.description: Strong coffee brewed over sweetened condensed milk, served over ice for a refreshing treat.

coffees.name: Macchiato
coffees.description: An espresso with a small amount of milk, often flavored and topped with foam.

coffees.name: Cinnamon Dolce Latte
coffees.description: A latte with the sweet and spicy flavors of cinnamon dolce syrup.

coffees.name: Peppermint Mocha
coffees.description: A festive mocha with the cool and minty taste of peppermint.

coffees.name: Caf√© au Lait
coffees.description: A simple and classic coffee with equal parts brewed coffee and steamed milk.

coffees.name: Honey Lavender Latte
coffees.description: A latte infused with the floral and sweet notes of honey and lavender.

coffees.name: Gingerbread Latte
coffees.description: A festive latte with the warm and spicy flavors of gingerbread.

coffees.name: Almond Milk Cappuccino
coffees.description: A cappuccino made with creamy almond milk for a nutty and dairy-free option.

coffees.name: Salted Caramel Cold Brew
coffees.description: A cold brew coffee with the indulgent sweetness of salted caramel.

coffees.name: Matcha Green Tea Latte
coffees.description: A latte made with vibrant matcha green tea powder for a unique and earthy flavor.
